alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 7:23PM CDT until September 05 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 722 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Pink, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Tecumseh, McLoud, Pink, Meeker, Earlsboro, Johnson, St. Louis, Brooksville, Macomb, Dale, Bethel Acres, Aydelotte, and Harjo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
